purpose: To provide a flexible and extensible framework for simulating various environments and scenarios in AI research and development.
principle: Built on modular architecture, allowing users to create, modify, and integrate different simulation components seamlessly.
reusability: Designed to promote code reusability through modular components and extensive documentation, enabling developers to leverage existing simulations for new projects.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, which may include incomplete features, potential bugs, and limited community support.
name: genie_sim
